description: A great cock can sometimes make up for average looks and visa versa - but Ty has both and then some!  A chiseled face handsome enough to have been pulled from the cover of a romance novel flanked by that perfect tower of cock that wet dreams are made of.They don't get much more ?All American? looking then this blonde haired, blued Southerner. Hearing him talking about rubbing off a load at Bush International Airport in Texas during a recent trip was almost as hot as the very hands on demonstration he does next.The big wet tip of his dick pokes over the top of the waistband of those boxers before they come down, that pole goes and he churns out a load of White Lightening big enough to quench the thirst of happy hour at the Astrodome.
title: Southern Comfort, Scene #01
